text: @RepByrne @GOPLeader @SpeakerPelosi An internal Chinese report warns that Beijing faces a rising wave of hostility in the wake of the coronavirus outbreak that could tip relations with the United States into confrontation, people familiar with the paper told Reuters. https://t.co/QsVazeDM2a
